citations.narrative:
Three Mini Golden Doodle puppies were shipped at 51 days of age, 5 days prior to 8 weeks of age. The puppies were
born on 2/8/25 and shipped on 3/31/25. Puppies younger than 8 weeks of age are more susceptible to stresses that occur
from travelling and being placed into a new facility. Their immune systems are more susceptible to becoming
compromised which could cause them to become sick and even die. The licensee must not sell and transport any puppies
under 8 weeks of age. Correct starting on 5/8/25.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
End of report.
Additional Inspectors:
Alexandra Friedman, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICER n

narrative:
2.130 
   
Minimum age requirements. 
Three Mini Golden Doodle puppies were shipped at 51 days of age, 5 days prior to 8 weeks of age. The puppies were 
born on 2/8/25 and shipped on 3/31/25. Puppies younger than 8 weeks of age are more susceptible to stresses that occur 
from travelling and being placed into a new facility. Their immune systems are more susceptible to becoming 
compromised which could cause them to become sick and even die. The licensee must not sell and transport any puppies 
under 8 weeks of age. Correct starting on 5/8/25. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee. 
 
End of report. 
 
Additional Inspectors: 
Alexandra Friedman, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICER n
